author: donaldp
msg: Added basic documentation for BlockListener assembly.

author: donaldp
msg: Made it possible to deploy Listeners via the assembly.xml file.

author: donaldp
msg: Update to latest Phoenix client libraries so that we can incorporate BlockListener/BlockEvent setup.

author: donaldp
msg: Integrate BlockProxy feature into pipeline so blocks never get direct references to other blocks but instead get references to proxys that implement all services Block supports.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a BlockProxy object that creates proxy objects for blocks. This is so that other Blocks can never access the non-public bits of block (like lifecycle methods).
It also allows us to block users of a Blocks Service after the block has been disposed.
